statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress > 0.8
SELECT student_id, progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE completion_status = TRUE
SELECT DISTINCT course_id FROM StudentProgress ORDER BY course_id DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.7
SELECT AVG(progress) AS average_progress FROM StudentProgress
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress, completion_status FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY progress DESC, course_id ASC
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE completion_status = true AND progress > 0.5 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM StudentProgress GROUP BY student_id HAVING avg_progress > 0.7 ORDER BY avg_progress DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, completion_status FROM StudentProgress WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY student_id ASC, course_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(course_id) AS total_courses FROM StudentProgress WHERE completion_status = false
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE completion_status = 'Complete';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_rating FROM OnlineCourses WHERE course_rating > 4.5;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM StudentProgress SP JOIN OnlineCourses OC ON SP.course_id = OC.course_id;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress SP INNER JOIN OnlineCourses OC ON SP.course_id = OC.course_id WHERE SP.progress_percentage >= 80;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress_percentage >= 80 ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM OnlineCourses WHERE course_rating > 4.5 ORDER BY course_rating DESC
SELECT student_id, progress_percentage FROM StudentProgress WHERE completion_status = 'complete' ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC
SELECT * FROM OnlineCourses WHERE course_duration < 10 AND course_rating < 4.0
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, course_duration FROM OnlineCourses WHERE course_rating BETWEEN 3.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY course_duration ASC
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM Courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, instructor_name FROM Students JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM Students WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor_name FROM Courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date;

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.student_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;

SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Courses.course_name = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Students UNION SELECT * FROM Courses ORDER BY student_id, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;

SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_percentage FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN progress ON enrollments.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id;
SELECT course_name, COUNT(student_id) AS enrolled_students FROM courses JOIN enrollments ON courses.course_id = enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name;

SELECT student_name, module_name, completion_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN progress ON enrollments.enrollment_id = progress.enrollment_id WHERE progress_percentage = 100 ORDER BY student_name ASC, completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = true;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT quiz_title, quiz_score FROM quizzes WHERE course_id = 3 ORDER BY quiz_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE completion_status = true ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, quiz_title, quiz_score FROM quizzes WHERE quiz_score > 80 ORDER BY quiz_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(grade_value) AS avg_grade FROM grades GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(grade_value) >= 90;
